subject: Football
Tumors
lead_paragraph: Ryan Leaf, the quarterback who was among the biggest N.F.L. draft busts after being taken No. 2 over all by the San Diego Chargers in 1998, is recovering from brain surgery in Santa Monica, Calif., to remove a benign tumor.
snippet: Ryan Leaf, the quarterback who was among the biggest N.F.L. draft busts after being taken No. 2 over all by the San Diego Chargers in 1998, is recovering from brain surgery in Santa Monica, Calif., to remove a benign tumor.
